header.rec_loc: At ANONâ€™s home in Guildford, Surrey
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: The recording process, a neighbour, physiotherapy, bad joints, clothes, weight and diets, food
header.activity: Friends talking about what they have been up to lately
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling

I said you know I just need some exercises I need to know what to do but I have to be very careful cos otherwise I set my back off and if I start doing things that set my back off then I just don't don't do the exercises so erm and then she said with the knee which is even more useful she said the reason I'm er she sai she reckons with s the correct exercise plan I may actually be able to stop the knee pain because what's happened is my knee caps have moved outwards

yeah but I don't know about you but didn't they just give you thick insoles which you can't get in any shoes you see that's what they did with me
